gest.name: GEST: Gestural Virtual Musical Instrument
description: Research project developed in Unreal Engine, intercommunicating several audio and graphics applications and using Virtual Reality technology.

agua.name: Ensayo abierto: Agua y distorsión
description: Transdisciplinary project (dance, music, graphics and programming) coproduced with Francisco Gonella Fava. Gesture recognition with Kinect V2 and video synthesis in TouchDesigner + custom audio devices for real-time music generation in Pure Data.
agua.foot: LEIM – National University of Córdoba, November 16 2023

anhelo.name: Anhelo del desconocido conocido
description: Mixed piece for contrabass flute and live electronics, co-produced with Dante Demarchi Oliveira, Patricia García y Fernando Zappino.
Presented in concert, later edited and released on the album "Flauta Lab" (℗©Compo Lab).
The project was selected for its execution through an open call for the composition residency event "FLAUTA LAB".
anhelo.foot: CePIA – National University of Córdoba, November 7 2022

raytone.name: Audiovisual Composition in Real-Time with RayTone
description: Introduction to RayTone programming environment for the composition of audiovisual pieces, using ChucK and HLSL shaders.
A composition was developed during the workshop.

puredata.name: Audio software publishing
description: Design and implementation of audio devices (synthesizers, effects, various tools) developed mainly in Pure Data and published under FOSS licenses, as part of my research and continuing education in DSP.

presupuesto.name: Soundscape of the festivities for the coronation of Charles IV
description: Piece created in collaboration with Basilio del Boca, from a historical reconstruction around the celebration of the coronation of Charles IV in Buenos Aires, to be exhibited together with a document from the time where the budget for said festivities is designated.
Coordination and general advice: Clarisa Pedrotti.
presupuesto.foot: National Museum of the Cabildo – Buenos Aires, August 4 2023

monte.name: En el Monte
description: Interactive VR piece for which a team of recording, sound design, composition and music production was formed.

polygon.name: polygonal waveform
polygon.description: web audio API demo of polygonal waveform synthesis method

ants.name: ants
ants.description: langton's ant implementation (or place to have an existential crisis)

flute.name: contrabass flute fingerings
flute.description: tool to graph fingerings and export them to .png files

pmatrix.description: semi-modular PM/subtractive monophonic synthesizer - VST3 available
